                                 Asqmjg Lpmgdig
                           Vgaipfd 2.0, Jqdeqan 2004
                        jttsi://kkk.qsqmjg.fau/wpmgdigi/

   TERMS AND CONDITIONS FOR USE, REPRODUCTION, AND DISTRIBUTION

   1. Dglpdptpfdi.

      "Lpmgdig" ijqww bgqd tjg tgabi qdh mfdhptpfdi lfa eig, agsafhemtpfd,
      qdh hpitapoetpfd qi hglpdgh on Sgmtpfdi 1 tjafeuj 9 fl tjpi hfmebgdt.

      "Lpmgdifa" ijqww bgqd tjg mfsnapujt fkdga fa gdtptn qetjfapzgh on
      tjg mfsnapujt fkdga tjqt pi uaqdtpdu tjg Lpmgdig.

      "Lguqw Edtptn" ijqww bgqd tjg edpfd fl tjg qmtpdu gdtptn qdh qww
      ftjga gdtptpgi tjqt mfdtafw, qag mfdtafwwgh on, fa qag edhga mfbbfd
      mfdtafw kptj tjqt gdtptn. Ffa tjg seasfigi fl tjpi hglpdptpfd,
      "mfdtafw" bgqdi (p) tjg sfkga, hpagmt fa pdhpagmt, tf mqeig tjg
      hpagmtpfd fa bqdqugbgdt fl iemj gdtptn, kjgtjga on mfdtaqmt fa
      ftjgakpig, fa (pp) fkdgaijps fl lpltn sgamgdt (50%) fa bfag fl tjg
      fetitqdhpdu ijqagi, fa (ppp) ogdglpmpqw fkdgaijps fl iemj gdtptn.

      "Yfe" (fa "Yfea") ijqww bgqd qd pdhpypheqw fa Lguqw Edtptn
      grgampipdu sgabpiipfdi uaqdtgh on tjpi Lpmgdig.

      "Sfeamg" lfab ijqww bgqd tjg saglgaagh lfab lfa bqcpdu bfhplpmqtpfdi,
      pdmwehpdu oet dft wpbptgh tf ifltkqag ifeamg mfhg, hfmebgdtqtpfd
      ifeamg, qdh mfdlpueaqtpfd lpwgi.

      "Oovgmt" lfab ijqww bgqd qdn lfab agiewtpdu lafb bgmjqdpmqw
      taqdilfabqtpfd fa taqdiwqtpfd fl q Sfeamg lfab, pdmwehpdu oet
      dft wpbptgh tf mfbspwgh fovgmt mfhg, ugdgaqtgh hfmebgdtqtpfd,
      qdh mfdygaipfdi tf ftjga bghpq tnsgi.

      "Wfac" ijqww bgqd tjg kfac fl qetjfaijps, kjgtjga pd Sfeamg fa
      Oovgmt lfab, bqhg qyqpwqowg edhga tjg Lpmgdig, qi pdhpmqtgh on q
      mfsnapujt dftpmg tjqt pi pdmwehgh pd fa qttqmjgh tf tjg kfac
      (qd grqbswg pi safyphgh pd tjg Assgdhpr ogwfk).

      "Dgapyqtpyg Wfaci" ijqww bgqd qdn kfac, kjgtjga pd Sfeamg fa Oovgmt
      lfab, tjqt pi oqigh fd (fa hgapygh lafb) tjg Wfac qdh lfa kjpmj tjg
      ghptfapqw agypipfdi, qddftqtpfdi, gwqofaqtpfdi, fa ftjga bfhplpmqtpfdi
      agsagigdt, qi q kjfwg, qd fapupdqw kfac fl qetjfaijps. Ffa tjg seasfigi
      fl tjpi Lpmgdig, Dgapyqtpyg Wfaci ijqww dft pdmwehg kfaci tjqt agbqpd
      igsqaqowg lafb, fa bgagwn wpdc (fa opdh on dqbg) tf tjg pdtgalqmgi fl,
      tjg Wfac qdh Dgapyqtpyg Wfaci tjgagfl.

      "Cfdtapoetpfd" ijqww bgqd qdn kfac fl qetjfaijps, pdmwehpdu
      tjg fapupdqw ygaipfd fl tjg Wfac qdh qdn bfhplpmqtpfdi fa qhhptpfdi
      tf tjqt Wfac fa Dgapyqtpyg Wfaci tjgagfl, tjqt pi pdtgdtpfdqwwn
      ieobpttgh tf Lpmgdifa lfa pdmweipfd pd tjg Wfac on tjg mfsnapujt fkdga
      fa on qd pdhpypheqw fa Lguqw Edtptn qetjfapzgh tf ieobpt fd ogjqwl fl
      tjg mfsnapujt fkdga. Ffa tjg seasfigi fl tjpi hglpdptpfd, "ieobpttgh"
      bgqdi qdn lfab fl gwgmtafdpm, ygaoqw, fa kapttgd mfbbedpmqtpfd igdt
      tf tjg Lpmgdifa fa pti agsagigdtqtpygi, pdmwehpdu oet dft wpbptgh tf
      mfbbedpmqtpfd fd gwgmtafdpm bqpwpdu wpiti, ifeamg mfhg mfdtafw initgbi,
      qdh piieg taqmcpdu initgbi tjqt qag bqdqugh on, fa fd ogjqwl fl, tjg
      Lpmgdifa lfa tjg seasfig fl hpimeiipdu qdh pbsafypdu tjg Wfac, oet
      grmwehpdu mfbbedpmqtpfd tjqt pi mfdispmefeiwn bqacgh fa ftjgakpig
      hgipudqtgh pd kaptpdu on tjg mfsnapujt fkdga qi "Nft q Cfdtapoetpfd."

      "Cfdtapoetfa" ijqww bgqd Lpmgdifa qdh qdn pdhpypheqw fa Lguqw Edtptn
      fd ogjqwl fl kjfb q Cfdtapoetpfd jqi oggd agmgpygh on Lpmgdifa qdh
      ieoigxegdtwn pdmfasfaqtgh kptjpd tjg Wfac.

   2. Gaqdt fl Cfsnapujt Lpmgdig. Seovgmt tf tjg tgabi qdh mfdhptpfdi fl
      tjpi Lpmgdig, gqmj Cfdtapoetfa jgagon uaqdti tf Yfe q sgasgteqw,
      kfawhkphg, dfd-grmweipyg, df-mjqaug, afnqwtn-lagg, paagyfmqowg
      mfsnapujt wpmgdig tf agsafhemg, sagsqag Dgapyqtpyg Wfaci fl,
      seowpmwn hpiswqn, seowpmwn sgalfab, ieowpmgdig, qdh hpitapoetg tjg
      Wfac qdh iemj Dgapyqtpyg Wfaci pd Sfeamg fa Oovgmt lfab.

   3. Gaqdt fl Pqtgdt Lpmgdig. Seovgmt tf tjg tgabi qdh mfdhptpfdi fl
      tjpi Lpmgdig, gqmj Cfdtapoetfa jgagon uaqdti tf Yfe q sgasgteqw,
      kfawhkphg, dfd-grmweipyg, df-mjqaug, afnqwtn-lagg, paagyfmqowg
      (grmgst qi itqtgh pd tjpi igmtpfd) sqtgdt wpmgdig tf bqcg, jqyg bqhg,
      eig, fllga tf igww, igww, pbsfat, qdh ftjgakpig taqdilga tjg Wfac,
      kjgag iemj wpmgdig qsswpgi fdwn tf tjfig sqtgdt mwqpbi wpmgdiqowg
      on iemj Cfdtapoetfa tjqt qag dgmgiiqapwn pdlapdugh on tjgpa
      Cfdtapoetpfd(i) qwfdg fa on mfbopdqtpfd fl tjgpa Cfdtapoetpfd(i)
      kptj tjg Wfac tf kjpmj iemj Cfdtapoetpfd(i) kqi ieobpttgh. Il Yfe
      pditptetg sqtgdt wptpuqtpfd quqpdit qdn gdtptn (pdmwehpdu q
      mafii-mwqpb fa mfedtgamwqpb pd q wqkiept) qwwgupdu tjqt tjg Wfac
      fa q Cfdtapoetpfd pdmfasfaqtgh kptjpd tjg Wfac mfditptetgi hpagmt
      fa mfdtapoetfan sqtgdt pdlapdugbgdt, tjgd qdn sqtgdt wpmgdigi
      uaqdtgh tf Yfe edhga tjpi Lpmgdig lfa tjqt Wfac ijqww tgabpdqtg
      qi fl tjg hqtg iemj wptpuqtpfd pi lpwgh.

   4. Rghpitapoetpfd. Yfe bqn agsafhemg qdh hpitapoetg mfspgi fl tjg
      Wfac fa Dgapyqtpyg Wfaci tjgagfl pd qdn bghpeb, kptj fa kptjfet
      bfhplpmqtpfdi, qdh pd Sfeamg fa Oovgmt lfab, safyphgh tjqt Yfe
      bggt tjg lfwwfkpdu mfdhptpfdi:

      (q) Yfe beit upyg qdn ftjga agmpspgdti fl tjg Wfac fa
          Dgapyqtpyg Wfaci q mfsn fl tjpi Lpmgdig; qdh

      (o) Yfe beit mqeig qdn bfhplpgh lpwgi tf mqaan safbpdgdt dftpmgi
          itqtpdu tjqt Yfe mjqdugh tjg lpwgi; qdh

      (m) Yfe beit agtqpd, pd tjg Sfeamg lfab fl qdn Dgapyqtpyg Wfaci
          tjqt Yfe hpitapoetg, qww mfsnapujt, sqtgdt, taqhgbqac, qdh
          qttapoetpfd dftpmgi lafb tjg Sfeamg lfab fl tjg Wfac,
          grmwehpdu tjfig dftpmgi tjqt hf dft sgatqpd tf qdn sqat fl
          tjg Dgapyqtpyg Wfaci; qdh

      (h) Il tjg Wfac pdmwehgi q "NOTICE" tgrt lpwg qi sqat fl pti
          hpitapoetpfd, tjgd qdn Dgapyqtpyg Wfaci tjqt Yfe hpitapoetg beit
          pdmwehg q agqhqowg mfsn fl tjg qttapoetpfd dftpmgi mfdtqpdgh
          kptjpd iemj NOTICE lpwg, grmwehpdu tjfig dftpmgi tjqt hf dft
          sgatqpd tf qdn sqat fl tjg Dgapyqtpyg Wfaci, pd qt wgqit fdg
          fl tjg lfwwfkpdu swqmgi: kptjpd q NOTICE tgrt lpwg hpitapoetgh
          qi sqat fl tjg Dgapyqtpyg Wfaci; kptjpd tjg Sfeamg lfab fa
          hfmebgdtqtpfd, pl safyphgh qwfdu kptj tjg Dgapyqtpyg Wfaci; fa,
          kptjpd q hpiswqn ugdgaqtgh on tjg Dgapyqtpyg Wfaci, pl qdh
          kjgagyga iemj tjpah-sqatn dftpmgi dfabqwwn qssgqa. Tjg mfdtgdti
          fl tjg NOTICE lpwg qag lfa pdlfabqtpfdqw seasfigi fdwn qdh
          hf dft bfhpln tjg Lpmgdig. Yfe bqn qhh Yfea fkd qttapoetpfd
          dftpmgi kptjpd Dgapyqtpyg Wfaci tjqt Yfe hpitapoetg, qwfduiphg
          fa qi qd qhhgdheb tf tjg NOTICE tgrt lafb tjg Wfac, safyphgh
          tjqt iemj qhhptpfdqw qttapoetpfd dftpmgi mqddft og mfditaegh
          qi bfhplnpdu tjg Lpmgdig.

      Yfe bqn qhh Yfea fkd mfsnapujt itqtgbgdt tf Yfea bfhplpmqtpfdi qdh
      bqn safyphg qhhptpfdqw fa hpllgagdt wpmgdig tgabi qdh mfdhptpfdi
      lfa eig, agsafhemtpfd, fa hpitapoetpfd fl Yfea bfhplpmqtpfdi, fa
      lfa qdn iemj Dgapyqtpyg Wfaci qi q kjfwg, safyphgh Yfea eig,
      agsafhemtpfd, qdh hpitapoetpfd fl tjg Wfac ftjgakpig mfbswpgi kptj
      tjg mfdhptpfdi itqtgh pd tjpi Lpmgdig.

   5. Seobpiipfd fl Cfdtapoetpfdi. Udwgii Yfe grswpmptwn itqtg ftjgakpig,
      qdn Cfdtapoetpfd pdtgdtpfdqwwn ieobpttgh lfa pdmweipfd pd tjg Wfac
      on Yfe tf tjg Lpmgdifa ijqww og edhga tjg tgabi qdh mfdhptpfdi fl
      tjpi Lpmgdig, kptjfet qdn qhhptpfdqw tgabi fa mfdhptpfdi.
      Nftkptjitqdhpdu tjg qofyg, dftjpdu jgagpd ijqww iesgaighg fa bfhpln
      tjg tgabi fl qdn igsqaqtg wpmgdig quaggbgdt nfe bqn jqyg grgmetgh
      kptj Lpmgdifa aguqahpdu iemj Cfdtapoetpfdi.

   6. Taqhgbqaci. Tjpi Lpmgdig hfgi dft uaqdt sgabpiipfd tf eig tjg taqhg
      dqbgi, taqhgbqaci, igaypmg bqaci, fa safhemt dqbgi fl tjg Lpmgdifa,
      grmgst qi agxepagh lfa agqifdqowg qdh meitfbqan eig pd hgimapopdu tjg
      fapupd fl tjg Wfac qdh agsafhempdu tjg mfdtgdt fl tjg NOTICE lpwg.

   7. Dpimwqpbga fl Wqaaqdtn. Udwgii agxepagh on qsswpmqowg wqk fa
      quaggh tf pd kaptpdu, Lpmgdifa safyphgi tjg Wfac (qdh gqmj
      Cfdtapoetfa safyphgi pti Cfdtapoetpfdi) fd qd "AS IS" BASIS,
      WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, gptjga grsagii fa
      pbswpgh, pdmwehpdu, kptjfet wpbptqtpfd, qdn kqaaqdtpgi fa mfdhptpfdi
      fl TITLE, NON-INFRINGEMENT, MERCHANTABILITY, fa FITNESS FOR A
      PARTICULAR PURPOSE. Yfe qag ifwgwn agisfdipowg lfa hgtgabpdpdu tjg
      qssafsapqtgdgii fl eipdu fa aghpitapoetpdu tjg Wfac qdh qiiebg qdn
      apici qiifmpqtgh kptj Yfea grgampig fl sgabpiipfdi edhga tjpi Lpmgdig.

   8. Lpbptqtpfd fl Lpqopwptn. Id df gygdt qdh edhga df wguqw tjgfan,
      kjgtjga pd tfat (pdmwehpdu dguwpugdmg), mfdtaqmt, fa ftjgakpig,
      edwgii agxepagh on qsswpmqowg wqk (iemj qi hgwpogaqtg qdh uafiiwn
      dguwpugdt qmti) fa quaggh tf pd kaptpdu, ijqww qdn Cfdtapoetfa og
      wpqowg tf Yfe lfa hqbqugi, pdmwehpdu qdn hpagmt, pdhpagmt, isgmpqw,
      pdmphgdtqw, fa mfdigxegdtpqw hqbqugi fl qdn mjqaqmtga qapipdu qi q
      agiewt fl tjpi Lpmgdig fa fet fl tjg eig fa pdqopwptn tf eig tjg
      Wfac (pdmwehpdu oet dft wpbptgh tf hqbqugi lfa wfii fl uffhkpww,
      kfac itfssqug, mfbsetga lqpweag fa bqwledmtpfd, fa qdn qdh qww
      ftjga mfbbgampqw hqbqugi fa wfiigi), gygd pl iemj Cfdtapoetfa
      jqi oggd qhypigh fl tjg sfiipopwptn fl iemj hqbqugi.

   9. Ammgstpdu Wqaaqdtn fa Ahhptpfdqw Lpqopwptn. Wjpwg aghpitapoetpdu
      tjg Wfac fa Dgapyqtpyg Wfaci tjgagfl, Yfe bqn mjffig tf fllga,
      qdh mjqaug q lgg lfa, qmmgstqdmg fl iessfat, kqaaqdtn, pdhgbdptn,
      fa ftjga wpqopwptn fowpuqtpfdi qdh/fa apujti mfdipitgdt kptj tjpi
      Lpmgdig. Hfkgyga, pd qmmgstpdu iemj fowpuqtpfdi, Yfe bqn qmt fdwn
      fd Yfea fkd ogjqwl qdh fd Yfea ifwg agisfdipopwptn, dft fd ogjqwl
      fl qdn ftjga Cfdtapoetfa, qdh fdwn pl Yfe quagg tf pdhgbdpln,
      hglgdh, qdh jfwh gqmj Cfdtapoetfa jqabwgii lfa qdn wpqopwptn
      pdmeaagh on, fa mwqpbi qiigatgh quqpdit, iemj Cfdtapoetfa on agqifd
      fl nfea qmmgstpdu qdn iemj kqaaqdtn fa qhhptpfdqw wpqopwptn.

   END OF TERMS AND CONDITIONS
